entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 22. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 10 May 2023
